CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 17, 1959, pg. 27 reads: "Unbeaten Cage Team - Members of the Bedford Recreation Center basketball team, unbeated in 11 games this season, are shown prior to taking the floor for a game at Ammon. Left to right, front row: James Jenks, Saul Ellis, Johnny Dinkin, captain; Harold Hamlin and Kenny Dunscomb.  Back row: Stanford Hardy, assistant manager; Clarence Hill, coach; Emby Williams, LaVarre Hill, Milton Flewellen, George Cook, Wadsworth Bradshaw, coach, and Harold Simmons, manager. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Bedford Recreation Center basketball team, front row, left to right, James Jenks, Saul Ellis, Johnny Dinkin, Harold Hamlin and Kenny Dunscomb.  Back row, left to right, Stanford Hardy, Clarence Hill, coach; Emby Williams, LaVarre Hill, Milton Flewellen, George Cook, Wadsworth Bradshaw, coach, and Harold Simmons, manager, gathered in Ammon Center
